I'm a second year master's student and fulltime software engineer at Dell EMC where I work in storage systems.

Word Game Assignment: Connecting

Stack Overflow:
How to make a edittext box in a dialoig

Other:
FirebaseUI-Android

Style:
Colors sourced from Material theme
Tile layout originally from Hello, Android UTTT game

In this round, you need to spell words using the larger grid. Choose a letter from one of the squares, and then add letters from adjacent squares. You can pick from a square multiple times, but not sequentially.

When squares become empty, you'll get a new random letter.

Each word is scored as the length of the word plus the scrabble score per letter, shown below:

1 point: A E I O N R T L S
2 points: D G
3 points: B C M P
4 points: F H V W Y
5 points: K
8 points: J X
10 points: Q Z

Hey you! Yeah, you!

Seems we have an alien problem here... Can you help?

Our quarter notes can stop their bullets. We can't let them hit the clef! Try placing an F note.
Phew, thanks! Someone forgot to close the staff with that there final barline. It was wide open for aliens to fly right in! Some people just don\'t pay attention...
I\'m the major general around here, by the way. Glad to have you with... Oh no, here they come again!
Watch out, looks like they\'re coming faster now!

Okay, look. Did I leave the bar open? Maybe.

Am I responsible for all these aliens flying around? Sure.

It's in the past!
Ah well, there\'s always next time...
I\'ve managed to upgrade our defenses a bit. A sharp note will deflect bullets at an angle.\n\nThat should help us with those pesky aliens when they\'re out of range.
You\'re a natural, I tell ya...
I\'ve got our flat note defenses online as well, give it a shot!
Don\'t tell me you\'re still upset at me for letting the aliens in. Whaddya want, an apology?
I guess we\'ll consider this accidental damage...
Good news: they gave up attacking the treble clef. Bad news: it\'s the bass clef now!\n\nYou gotta help me out here!
You should\'ve told me you were a master at the bass clef, too!
Bit of an odd mnemonic, don\'t you think? I\'m sure an alien could eat whatever they want...
I managed to shift the piano for you last time, but I can\'t keep it going! Use flats to pick off those real low ones.
Gee, that could have been a major disaster! I think we\'ve cleared all of them out. Thanks for the help!
Oh no, they baroque through! Sorry, couldn\'t resist, heh heh...\n\nWe\'re doomed...
